Classes¶

Classes are broken up into two seperate subject, general and tools. General classes are those associated with the GUI and rendering directly to the screen. Tools are classes related to the backend of the application, powering frontend objects.

General¶

  • Calipso

Polygon Module¶

  • PolygonDrawer

Tools Module¶

  • ToolTip
  • ToggleableButton
  • ToolbarToggleableButton
  • NavigationToolbar2Calipso
